overview: Jonathan is the founder of Elanex, a language translation technology and services company based in San Francisco. Before that he co-founded eterniTV, a provider of technology and services for creating searchable, browsable internet video archives, and systemsGo, a leading provider of IT services across Asia. Jonathan grew up in the UK and was educated at Cambridge University. He has lived in Italy, Japan and the US, and speaks, reads and writes Japanese.
